templateVersions.content:
Task "Customized output for student course withdrawal"
Instructions 1. {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If output is empty, { }, provide the message "No course connection found. Did you mean: " where a list of course connection the student is enrolled in is shown 3. If output is not empty, provide a message "Successfully withdraw from course." and provide a link to the updated course connection.

Task "Customized output for student course withdrawal"
Instructions 1. {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If output is empty '{}', display the message: "No course connection found. Did you mean: " followed by a list of course connections the student is enrolled in.
3. If output is not empty: - Display: "Successfully withdrawn from course <<the withdrawn course>>." - Pull up the course connection record completed with Course Connection ID, Student Name, Program Enrollment ID, hed__Course_Enrollment__c.rio_ed__Course_ID__c, Course, and Enrollment Status

Task "Customized output for student course withdrawal"
Instructions 1. {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If output is null or empty, display the message: "No course connection found." 3. If output is not empty: - Display: "Successfully withdrawn from course <<the withdrawn course>>." - Pull up the course connection record completed with Course Connection ID, Student Name, Program Enrollment ID, hed__Course_Enrollment__c.rio_ed__Course_ID__c, Course, and Enrollment Status

Task "Get output from 'REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal’ and generate an output message"
Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If output is null or empty {}, display the message: "No course connection found." 3. If output is not empty: - Display: "Successfully withdrawn from course <<the withdrawn course>>." - Pull up the course connection record completed with Course Connection ID, Student Name, Program Enrollment ID, hed__Course_Enrollment__c.rio_ed__Course_ID__c, Course, and Enrollment Status

Task "Get output from 'REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal’ and generate an output message"
Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If output is null or empty {}, display the message: "No course connection found." 3. If output is not empty: - Display: "Successfully withdrawn from course <<the withdrawn course>>." - Pull up the course connection record completed with hed__Course_Enrollment__c.rio_ed__Course_ID__c, Course, and Enrollment Status

Task "Get output from 'REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal’ and generate an output message"
Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. - Display: "Successfully withdrawn from course <<the withdrawn course>>." - Pull up the course connection record completed with hed__Course_Enrollment__c.rio_ed__Course_ID__c, Course, and Enrollment Status - Format the output

Task Get output from 'REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal’ and generate an output message
Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If isSuccess = false , display the error message starting with "Course Enrollment failed." + message. 3. If isSuccess is true, display: "Successfully withdrawn from course." + Contact Name, Course Connection, and Enrollment Status.

Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AF_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If isSuccess = false , display the error message starting with "Course Enrollment failed." + message. 3. If isSuccess is true, display: "Successfully withdrawn from course." + Contact Name, Course Connection, and Enrollment Status. Format the output with each information in one new line.

Instructions 1. Get result from REDU_AI_Course_Withdrawal and pass it into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If isSuccess = false , display the error message starting with "Course Enrollment failed." + message. 3. If isSuccess is true, display: "Successfully withdrawn from course." + Contact Name, Course Connection, and Enrollment Status. Format the output with each information in one new line.

Instructions 1. Get the output from Course_Withdrawal_Management and pass the responseData into {!$Input:courseWithdrawalResult} 2. If isSuccess from Course_Withdrawal_Management is false then display the error message starting with "Course Enrollment failed." + message. 3. If isSuccess from Course_Withdrawal_Management is true then display: "Successfully withdrawn from course." + Contact Name, Course Connection, and Enrollment Status. Format the output with each information in one new line.
